entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 10 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Thursday 26 January 2023
